subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets exercised the club’s option on Manager Terry Collins that will keep him through the 2013 season, and Jose Reyes kept up his chase for the batting title with two home runs.
snippet: The Mets exercised the club’s option on Manager Terry Collins that will keep him through the 2013 season, and Jose Reyes kept up his chase for the batting title with two home runs.
